duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing operation of distillation projects and hydrogenation reactors.
Applying technical skills to optimize plant operations and implement cost saving projects.
Working closely with plant personnel, Technical Advising, and Quality Assurance to ensure all product specifications are met.
Developing cost-effective projects to optimize production and minimize working capital.
Generating reports including mass balances, process data analysis, and de-bottlenecking proposals.
Leading improvement meetings and pre/post-campaign meetings for specific projects.
Collecting utilization data and generating monthly dashboards for distribution.
Troubleshooting plant operations and identifying process and safety improvements.
Communicating technical information and issues to plant personnel at all levels within the organization.
Participating in site qualification efforts and operator training.
Optimizing the disposition of waste generated in projects to improve cost savings.
Developing and maintaining campaign-specific schedules to meet production demand.
